voice_moments.morning_intention: ğŸŒ… Good morning, Klemen. Before you move, take 60 seconds. Close your eyes. You are about to CREATE your day. See it unfolding perfectly. Your business thriving. Melisa smiling. Noel laughing. Money flowing. You're not wishing for it â€” you're SELECTING it from infinite possibilities. Feel it as DONE. Now open your eyes and step into that reality.
voice_moments.evening_sats: ğŸŒ™ Tonight before you sleep, you're going to do SATS â€” State Akin To Sleep. Neville Goddard's most powerful technique. Lie down. Get comfortable. Imagine a scene that implies your wish is fulfilled. Maybe you're holding the keys to your Naklo house. Maybe you're looking at your bank account showing â‚¬1,000,000. Maybe Melisa is smiling because you just told her you've made it. Choose ONE scene. Loop it. Feel it. Don't let your mind wander. Fall asleep IN that scene. Your subconscious will do the rest. Sleep well, millionaire.
